titleStmt.title: A proclamation of the Parliament of the Commonwealth of England declaring Charls Stuart and his abettors, agents and complices, to be traytors, rebels and publique enemies.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field, Printer to the Parliament of England,

notesStmt.note: Order to print dated: Monday, 25th August, 1651. Signed: Hen: Scobell, Cleric. Parliamenti.
With engraving of Parliamentary seal at head of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
